sentences: Ma ütlesin talle, et ma lähen kinno.
Ta ütlesin, et ta on valmis.
Ütlesin endale, et see on hea mõte.
context: The word ütlesin is the first person singular past tense form of the verb ütlema, which means to say or tell something. It is commonly used in Estonian language to express that someone has said something.
